00319 QtMultiArg::operator = ( const QtMultiArg & arg )
00320 {
00321     if( this != &arg )
00322     {
00323         QtArg::operator = ( arg );

00325         m_count = arg.count();

00342 inline void
00343 QtMultiArg::setValue( const QVariant & v )
00344 {
00345     QList< QVariant > values = value().toList();
00346     values.append( v );
00347 
00348     QtArg::setValue( values );

00351 inline void
00352 QtMultiArg::checkConstraint() const
00353 {
00354     if( isDefined() )
00355     {
00356         QList< QVariant > values = value().toList();
00357 
00358         foreach( QVariant v, values )
00359             if( constraint() && !constraint()->check( v ) )
00360                 throw QtArgContraintNotObservedEx(
00361                     QString::fromLatin1( "Constraint for the argument: %1"
00362                     " hasn't observed. Wrong value is: %2" )
00363                         .arg( names().size() ? names().front() : flags().front() )
00364                         .arg( v.toString() ) );
00365     }
00366 }
00367 
00368 inline QString
00369 QtMultiArg::getHelpString( const NamesList & namesList ) const
00370 {
00371     QString help = getUsageString( namesList );
00372     help.append( QLatin1String( " [...]" ) );
00373     help.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeDescription );
00374     help.append( description() );
00375     help.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::newLine );
00376 
00377     return help;
00378 }
00379 
00380 inline int
00381 QtMultiArg::process( QtArgCmdLineContext & context )
00382 {
00383     if( isWithValue() )
00384     {
00385         ++m_count;
00386 
00387         return QtArg::process( context );
00388     }
00389     else
00390     {
00391         bool ok = false;
00392         int intValue = 0;
00393 
00394         if( !context.atEnd() )
00395         {
00396             const QString value = context.next();
00397             intValue = value.toInt( &ok );
00398 
00399             if( !ok )
00400                 context.putBack();
00401         }
00402 
00403         if( ok )
00404             m_count += intValue;
00405         else
00406             ++m_count;
00407 
00408         setPresent( true );
00409 
00410         if( !isDefined() )
00411             QtArg::setValue( QVariant( true ) );
00412 
00413         return 1;
00414     }
00415 
00416     return 0;
00417 }
